resources.string: Share your unique code with friends. The more you share, the more you earn.
You can earn up to %s from people you have referred already. Ask them to complete challenge, earn more and more.
Refer your %1$s friends to ride with Pathao and you can earn upto %2$s when they complete their challenge.
